itunes:title: #223 - Social Media Marketing for Online and Local Business with Ellen Matis
title: #223 - Social Media Marketing for Online and Local Business with Ellen Matis
description:
Boss friend Ellen Matis joins Emily in this episode to talk about creating boundaries for social media, the impact that local community involvement can have on your life and business, and why it's important to invest in your community and neighbors.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting and Acuity Scheduling.

Get full show notes for this episode here
